title: Former Block stars Karstan Smith and Maxine Stokes welcome their first child together
text:
The Block's Karstan Smith and Maxine Stokes have welcomed their first child.

Karstan and Max - who appeared on the 2014 series, The Block: Glasshouse - took to Instagram on Friday to announce the birth of their daughter, Zuri.

The first-time parents look exhausted, but happy, in a photo showing them cuddling up to their newborn baby girl.

Baby girl: The Block's Karstan Smith and Maxine Stokes have welcomed their first child together, a daughter called Zuri

Seemingly taken at Newcastle Private Hospital on the New South Wales Central Coast, a shirtless Karstan can be seen cradling the sleeping newborn.

A tired-looking Max is lying beside them in a black tank top, grinning as she rests her head on her hand.

'Hello World... Meet our girl ZURI. Earth side on 22.10.19 weighing in at 3750g & measuring 49.5cm. Both Max & bub are doing really well... even with the mind blowing 45 minute labour,' they wrote.

Something to celebrate: Many of their celebrity friends were quick to congratulate the couple on the birth of their first child

Welcome to the family: Even The Block paid tribute to the young family, sharing Karstan and Max's post on their own Instagram page

Many of the couple's celebrity friends were quick to congratulate the pair on the birth of their first child.

'Congrats guys!!! Zuri is adorable!' wrote House Rules stars Tim and Mat, while Alex Fevola added, 'Beautiful! Congratulations xx'.

Even The Block paid tribute to the young family, sharing Karstan and Max's post on their own Instagram page.

Bumping along: Max had been documenting her pregnancy as it progressed on Instagram, sharing a series of photos of her growing baby bump

'Welcome to #TheBlock family, Zuri!' they captioned the photo.

Max had been documenting her pregnancy as it progressed on Instagram, sharing a series of photos of her growing baby bump.

'Family of 3 soon to be 4,' she wrote at just the beginning of the week, including the hashtag '#AnyDayNow'.
description: The Block's Karstan Smith and Maxine Stokes have just welcomed their first child together. Karstan and Max took to Instagram on Friday to announce the birth of their daughter, Zuri.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
